# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/postcss-page-break`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for postcss-page-break (https://github.com/shrpne/postcss-page-break#readme).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/postcss-page-break.
## [index.d.ts](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/postcss-page-break/index.d.ts)
````ts
import { PluginCreator } from "postcss";

declare const pageBreak: PluginCreator<{}>;

export = pageBreak;

````
